column1: Why is my father so abusive? beats me
column3: Beats can mean to physically hit someone or to be confused or defeated by something.
column4: My father often beats the drums in a band.
column5: I beat my opponent in the chess match easily.

column1: Dim light bulbs or bright light bulbs? watts the difference!
column3: Watts refers to a unit of power and sounds like whats, which is used in a question.
column4: The light bulbs power consumption is measured in watts.
column5: Whats your favorite type of music to listen to while studying?

column1: Note: The jokes like beats me and watts the difference effectively play on the dual meanings described, leading to the constructed serious sentences that follow the given requirements.
